title: The Enemy Within
description: Welcome to the Twin Cities of Salaria and Tarson. The accomplishment of humans working with Elves and Dwarves, to create one of greatest human cities to ever exist. When raids outside the cities threaten the peace of the citizens Second Commander Shadoe Van Ives doubts that the Goblins and Robbers are working alone. On a personal quest to find the one responsible, he uncovers a conspiracy that has poisoned both cities. Caught in the black web of deception is the one man Shadoe trusted. Shadoe is no stranger to having enemies, but since he can no longer trust anyone in the garrison he turns to those most loyal to him. Risking the exposure of his darkest secret to the corrupt High Priest, Shadoe and Paulis square off in an epic battle of wills. As the war heats up in the daylight there will be a darker battle waging in the shadows.
author: Lynette White
